description: Pipeline to show usage of httpRequest stage

stages.description: To extract the query key from request body
stages.script:
function handleRequest() {try {    return {        query: JSON.parse(context.request.body).query[0].value    }} catch (e) { throw e }
}

stages.description: To get data from data muse api in asynchronous manner
Merges the data muse response to RS API response
stages.script:
function handleRequest() {return {    response: {        ...context.response, body:            JSON.stringify({                ...JSON.parse(context.response.body), data_muse: context.data_muse_api            })    }}
}
